00170         btVector3 getForwardVector() const
00171         {
00172                 const btTransform& chassisTrans = getChassisWorldTransform(); 
00173 
00174                 btVector3 forwardW ( 
00175                           chassisTrans.getBasis()[0][m_indexForwardAxis], 
00176                           chassisTrans.getBasis()[1][m_indexForwardAxis], 
00177                           chassisTrans.getBasis()[2][m_indexForwardAxis]); 
00178 
00179                 return forwardW;
00180         }
